nodes.id: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

zh-cn: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论
无产阶级专政下继续革命理论

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命的指导思想，核心是认为在无产阶级取得政权并建立社会主义制度后，还要进行一个阶级推翻一个阶级的政治大革命。
description.en: The guiding ideology of the Cultural Revolution, its core belief is that after the proletariat has seized political power and established a socialist system, it is still necessary to carry out a political great revolution in which one class overthrows another.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发起和领导的在中国大陆持续十年的政治运动，对中国历史产生了深远影响。
description.en: A decade-long political movement in mainland China, initiated and led by Mao Zedong, which had a profound impact on Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist, who was the main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 关于正确处理人民内部矛盾的问题

zh-cn: 关于正确处理人民内部矛盾的问题
en: On the Correct Handling of Contradictions Among the People

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1957年发表的著作，提出了社会主义社会中存在两类不同性质矛盾的学说，为“继续革命理论”奠定了理论基础。
description.en: A work published by Mao Zedong in 1957, which proposed the theory of two different types of contradictions in socialist society and laid the theoretical foundation for the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 1966年5月中共中央政治局扩大会议通过的文件，由康生、陈伯达等人起草，毛泽东改定，被认为是文化大革命发起的标志之一。
description.en: A document passed by the enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee in May 1966, drafted by Kang Sheng, Chen Boda and others, revised by Mao Zedong, and considered one of the signals for the launch of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前领导人之一，文化大革命期间担任中央文革小组顾问。
description.en: A former leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as an advisor to the Central Cultural Revolution Group during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前领导人之一，曾任毛泽东的政治秘书，文化大革命期间担任中央文革小组组长。
description.en: A former leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who once served as Mao Zedong's political secretary and was the head of the Central Cultural Revolution Group during the Cultural Revolution.

en: Party Literature Research Center of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 负责编辑、研究、翻译中国共产党和国家主要领导人著作的机构。
description.en: An institution responsible for editing, researching, and translating the works of major leaders of the Communist Party of China and the state.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席。在文化大革命中被打倒并迫害致死。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as the Chairman of the People's Republic of China. He was overthrown and persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the chief architect of China's reform and opening-up.

nodes.id: 沿着十月社会主义革命开辟的道路前进

zh-cn: 沿着十月社会主义革命开辟的道路前进
en: Advance Along the Road Opened Up by the October Socialist Revolution

description.zh-cn: 由“两报一刊”共同发表的社论，首次将毛泽东发动文革的思想概括为“无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论”的六个要点。
description.en: An editorial jointly published by the 'Two Newspapers and One Journal', which for the first time summarized Mao Zedong's ideas for launching the Cultural Revolution into six key points of the 'Theory of Continuing the Revolution under the Dictatorship of the Proletariat'.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，文化大革命期间担任中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: A member of the 'Gang of Four', who served as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee during the Cultural Revolution.

en: 9th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第九次全国代表大会，以“继续革命理论”为指导，并将该思想写入《中国共产党章程》。
description.en: The 9th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, which was guided by the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution' and incorporated this ideology into the Constitution of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，文化大革命期间担任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: A member of the 'Gang of Four', who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CPC Central Committee during the Cultural Revolution.

en: Constitution of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的根本规章。1969年中共九大通过的版本正式写入了“继续革命”思想。
description.en: The fundamental regulations of the Communist Party of China. The version passed by the 9th National Congress of the CPC in 1969 formally incorporated the 'Continuing Revolution' ideology.

nodes.id: 论对资产阶级的全面专政

zh-cn: 论对资产阶级的全面专政
en: On Exercising All-Round Dictatorship Over the Bourgeoisie

description.zh-cn: 张春桥根据毛泽东关于理论问题的指示所写的文章，提出“必须对资产阶级实行全面专政”，是对“继续革命理论”的补充。
description.en: An article written by Zhang Chunqiao based on Mao Zedong's instructions on theoretical issues, which proposed that 'all-round dictatorship must be exercised over the bourgeoisie' and served as a supplement to the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命晚期根据《毛主席重要指示》提出的概念，认为资产阶级“就在共产党内”。
description.en: A concept proposed in the late stage of the Cultural Revolution based on 'Chairman Mao's Important Instructions', which argued that the bourgeoisie was 'right inside the Communist Party'.

description.zh-cn: 指1976年10月6日，时任中共中央第一副主席华国锋等人发动的、旨在拘捕“四人帮”成员的政治事件，标志着文化大革命的结束。
description.en: Refers to the political event on October 6, 1976, initiated by then First Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee Hua Guofeng and others to arrest the members of the 'Gang of Four', marking the end of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 指中国文化大革命后期，由王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元组成的政治集团。
description.en: A political faction in China during the later stages of the Cultural Revolution, composed of Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, and Yao Wenyuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，毛泽东逝世后，他通过怀仁堂政变拘捕“四人帮”，结束了文化大革命。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. After Mao Zedong's death, he arrested the 'Gang of Four' through the Huairentang Coup, ending the Cultural Revolution.

en: 11th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一次全国代表大会，其政治报告否定了“党内资产阶级”这一术语。
description.en: The 11th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, whose political report rejected the term 'bourgeoisie inside the Party'.

description.zh-cn: 中国理论家，其文章《“继续革命”问题的探讨》对“继续革命理论”的核心论点提出了质疑。
description.en: A Chinese theorist whose article 'An Inquiry into the Problem of "Continuing the Revolution"' questioned the core tenets of the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央总书记。他审阅并支持了吴江对“继续革命理论”提出质疑的文章。
description.en: A former major leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee. He reviewed and supported Wu Jiang's article that questioned the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

en: Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议，其会议公报不再提及“继续革命理论”，标志着该理论被逐步放弃。
description.en: The Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, whose communiqué no longer mentioned the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution', marking the gradual abandonment of the theory.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内的理论家和政治家，率先提出应重估“无产阶级专政下继续革命”这一口号。
description.en: A theorist and politician within the Communist Party of China, who was the first to propose a re-evaluation of the slogan 'Continuing the Revolution under the Dictatorship of the Proletariat'.

en: Sixth Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第六次全体会议，通过了《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》。
description.en: The Sixth Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, which passed the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China'.

nodes.id: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

zh-cn: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议
en: Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1981年中共十一届六中全会通过的文件，该决议正式否定了“无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论”和文化大革命。
description.en: A document passed by the Sixth Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CPC in 1981, which formally negated the 'Theory of Continuing the Revolution under the Dictatorship of the Proletariat' and the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 马克思主义理论，在中共九大党章中被提及，康生解释其与“继续革命”为同一概念的两种翻译。
description.en: A Marxist theory mentioned in the Constitution of the 9th CPC Congress. Kang Sheng explained it as two translations of the same concept as 'Continuing Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 指1967年1月在上海发生的夺权事件，毛泽东的评价标志着“继续革命理论”的形成。
description.en: Refers to the power seizure event in Shanghai in January 1967. Mao Zedong's comments on it marked the formation of the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾的一个毛主义政党，坚持“继续革命理论”。
description.en: A Maoist political party in the Philippines that adheres to the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 印度的一个毛主义政党，坚持“继续革命理论”。
description.en: A Maoist political party in India that adheres to the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其的一个毛主义政党，坚持“继续革命理论”。
description.en: A Maoist political party in Turkey that adheres to the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

relationships.source: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论
relationships.target: 文化大革命

description.zh-cn: “无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论”被普遍认为是文化大革命的指导思想。
description.en: The 'Theory of Continuing the Revolution under the Dictatorship of the Proletariat' is widely regarded as the guiding ideology of the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东提出了一系列构成“继续革命理论”核心的思想和论断，是该理论的主要创立者。
description.en: Mao Zedong proposed a series of ideas and arguments that form the core of the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution', making him its primary founder.

relationships.source: 关于正确处理人民内部矛盾的问题
relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在该著作中全面提出了无产阶级专政下的矛盾、阶级和阶级斗争问题，为“继续革命理论”奠定了理论基础。
description.en: In this work, Mao Zedong comprehensively raised the issues of contradiction, class, and class struggle under the dictatorship of the proletariat, laying the theoretical foundation for the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

relationships.target: 五一六通知

description.zh-cn: 康生是《五一六通知》的主要起草人之一。
description.en: Kang Sheng was one of the main drafters of the 'May 16 Notification'.

relationships.target: 五一六通知

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达是《五一六通知》的主要起草人之一。
description.en: Chen Boda was one of the main drafters of the 'May 16 Notification'.

relationships.target: 五一六通知

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东亲自改定了《五一六通知》。
description.en: Mao Zedong personally revised the 'May 16 Notification'.

relationships.target: 文化大革命

description.zh-cn: 《五一六通知》的通过被认为是文化大革命全面发动的标志之一。
description.en: The passing of the 'May 16 Notification' is considered one of the signals for the full-scale launch of the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.source: 沿着十月社会主义革命开辟的道路前进
relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 这篇社论首次将毛泽东发动文革的思想概括为“无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论”的六个要点。
description.en: This editorial was the first to summarize Mao Zedong's ideas for launching the Cultural Revolution into six key points of the 'Theory of Continuing the Revolution under the Dictatorship of the Proletariat'.

relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 中共九大的政治报告以“继续革命理论”为指导，并将该思想写入了《中国共产党章程》。
description.en: The political report of the 9th National Congress of the CPC was guided by the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution', and this ideology was incorporated into the Constitution of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 论对资产阶级的全面专政

description.zh-cn: 张春桥撰写了《论对资产阶级的全面专政》一文，作为对“继续革命理论”的补充和发展。
description.en: Zhang Chunqiao wrote the article 'On Exercising All-Round Dictatorship Over the Bourgeoisie' as a supplement and development of the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

relationships.target: 四人帮

description.zh-cn: 华国锋等人通过怀仁堂政变，一举拘捕了“四人帮”成员。
description.en: Hua Guofeng and others arrested the members of the 'Gang of Four' in the Huairentang Coup.

relationships.target: 四人帮

description.zh-cn: 华国锋领导并实施了旨在拘捕“四人帮”的怀仁堂政变。
description.en: Hua Guofeng led and carried out the Huairentang Coup aimed at arresting the 'Gang of Four'.

relationships.target: 党内资产阶级

description.zh-cn: 中共十一大的政治报告否定了“党内资产阶级”这一术语。
description.en: The political report of the 11th National Congress of the CPC rejected the term 'bourgeoisie inside the Party'.

relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 吴江发表文章《“继续革命”问题的探讨》，认为继续革命的重要任务不应是整“走资派”，对“继续革命理论”提出质疑。
description.en: Wu Jiang published the article 'An Inquiry into the Problem of "Continuing the Revolution"', arguing that the important task of continuing the revolution should not be to target 'capitalist roaders', thereby questioning the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

relationships.target: 吴江 (理论家)

description.zh-cn: 时任中央党校副校长的胡耀邦审阅并支持了吴江对“继续革命理论”提出质疑的文章发表。
description.en: Hu Yaobang, then Vice President of the Central Party School, reviewed and supported the publication of Wu Jiang's article questioning the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

relationships.target: 吴江 (理论家)

description.zh-cn: 邓小平认可了吴江在其文章中对“继续革命理论”的批判性探讨。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping approved of Wu Jiang's critical examination of the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution' in his article.

relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 中共十一届三中全会的会议公报不再提及“继续革命理论”，标志着该理论在官方话语体系中的终结。
description.en: The communiqué of the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CPC no longer mentioned the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution', marking the end of the theory in the official discourse.

relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 胡乔木率先提出应重估“无产阶级专政下继续革命”这一口号，开启了对其的全面否定过程。
description.en: Hu Qiaomu was the first to propose a re-evaluation of the slogan 'Continuing the Revolution under the Dictatorship of the Proletariat', initiating the process of its complete negation.

relationships.target: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议

description.zh-cn: 中共十一届六中全会通过了《关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议》。
description.en: The Sixth Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CPC passed the 'Resolution on Certain Questions in the History of Our Party Since the Founding of the People's Republic of China'.

relationships.source: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议
relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 《决议》正式并全面地否定了“无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论”，认为其既不符合马克思列宁主义，也不符合中国实际。
description.en: The 'Resolution' formally and comprehensively negated the 'Theory of Continuing the Revolution under the Dictatorship of the Proletariat', judging it to be inconsistent with both Marxism-Leninism and the reality of China.

relationships.source: 关于建国以来党的若干历史问题的决议
relationships.target: 文化大革命

description.zh-cn: 《决议》正式否定了文化大革命，认为它是一场由领导者错误发动，被反革命集团利用，给党、国家和各族人民带来严重灾难的内乱。
description.en: The 'Resolution' formally negated the Cultural Revolution, deeming it a period of internal turmoil initiated by a leader under a misapprehension and capitalized on by counter-revolutionary cliques, which brought severe disaster to the Party, the state, and the people of all nationalities.

relationships.target: 刘少奇

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇在文化大革命中被定为“党内最大的走资本主义道路的当权派”，遭到残酷迫害，最终含冤去世。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Liu Shaoqi was labeled the 'biggest capitalist roader in the Party' and was brutally persecuted, eventually dying in disgrace.

relationships.target: 邓小平

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在文化大革命期间两次被打倒，被指为“党内第二号走资派”。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was purged twice during the Cultural Revolution, accused of being the 'number two capitalist roader in the Party'.

relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 康生在中共九大解释称，“不断革命”和“继续革命”是同一名词的两种翻译方法，表明二者存在理论关联。
description.en: At the 9th CPC Congress, Kang Sheng explained that 'Permanent Revolution' and 'Continuing Revolution' were two different translations of the same term, indicating a theoretical connection between them.

relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东对上海“一月风暴”的评价被认为是“继续革命理论”比较完全形成的标志。
description.en: Mao Zedong's assessment of the 'January Storm' in Shanghai is considered a sign of the relatively complete formation of the 'Theory of Continuing Revolution'.

relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾共产党至今仍坚持“无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论”。
description.en: The Communist Party of the Philippines continues to adhere to the 'Theory of Continuing the Revolution under the Dictatorship of the Proletariat' to this day.

relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 印度共产党（毛主义）至今仍坚持“无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论”。
description.en: The Communist Party of India (Maoist) continues to adhere to the 'Theory of Continuing the Revolution under the Dictatorship of the Proletariat' to this day.

relationships.target: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 土耳其共产党/马列至今仍坚持“无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论”。
description.en: The Communist Party of Turkey/Marxist–Leninist continues to adhere to the 'Theory of Continuing the Revolution under the Dictatorship of the Proletariat' to this day.
